document.full_text: michael ignatieff, the liberal party leader who resigned tuesday after the party's poor performance in this week's federal election, said thursday he would take a position at the university of toronto.
document.title: the americas: canada: liberal leader returns to academia
lines_and_colors: michael ignatieff, the liberal party leader who resigned tuesday after the party's poor performance in this week's federal election, said thursday he would take a position at the university of toronto.
